titlepage.titleproper: Register of the Congo (Democratic Republic) Subject Collection, 1960-2001
titlepage.publisher:
Hoover Institution Archives
Stanford University
Stanford, California
titlepage.p: © 1998 Hoover Institution Archives. All rights reserved.

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.abstract: Electronic bulletins, pamphlets, bulletins, serial issues, speeches, leaflets, reports, and other printed matter, relating to political, social and economic conditions in the Democratic Republic of the Congo.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: The Hoover Institution Archives only allows access to copies of audiovisual items. To listen to sound recordings or to view videos or films during your visit, please contact the Archives at least two working days before your arrival. We will then advise you of the accessibility of the material you wish to see or hear. Please note that not all audiovisual material is immediately accessible.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: For copyright status, please contact the Hoover Institution Archives.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Congo (Democratic Republic) subject collection, [Box no.], Hoover Institution Archives.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Acquired by the Hoover Institution Archives.

accruals.head: Accruals
accruals.p: Materials may have been added to the collection since this finding aid was prepared. To determine if this has occurred, find the collection in Stanford University's online catalog at http://searchworks.stanford.edu/. Materials have been added to the collection if the number of boxes listed in the online catalog is larger than the number of boxes listed in this finding aid.

odd.p: Bulletins, leaflets, newsletter, pamphlets, reports, serial issues and speeches relating to economic, political and social conditions in Zaire
Leaflet, newsletter and printed matter relating to political conditions in Zaire and its relationship with the United States
Brochures, printed matter and printed copy of an interview relating to the revolutionary movements in Zaire

dsc.head: Container List
dsc.p: See card catalog for increments that may have been received after February 1995

did.unittitle: Printed copy. Interview with M. Felix Mukulubundu

scopecontent.p: This addition to the collection has not yet been described. Please let the Hoover Institution Archives know if you would like to see this material described.
